feed.title: Bug in 2-of-3 transaction signing in Bitcoind?

entry.title: Bug in 2-of-3 transaction signing in Bitcoind?
entry.summary: It seems that a transaction has been accepted into the blockchain 15 blocks ago, even though there have been issues with getting anything to accept the transaction. However, it is unlikely for the transaction to be accepted again as it would be considered double-spending.
